metadata.title: CVE-2018-11729 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_mft_entry_read_header function inlibfsntfs_mft_entry.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remoteattackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read)via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
